title: Introduction
content:
My name is Jeremy White and this is my first post. I’m an undergraduate student at the Nova Scotia College of Art and Design, where i’m obtaining my degree in interdisciplinary design with a major in graphic / typographic design! - I look forward to reading your discussions! - Cheers

“You can’t really pimp your kerning at 72dpi.” - Christopher Dean

 [‹ Needing someone to check out ebook display on their kindle](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110231/http:/typophile.com/node/50148 "Go to previous forum topic") [So what sells well in Europe? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110231/http:/typophile.com/node/49977 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Jeremy White

comments.content: Hello Jeremy, why did you write that quote in your introduction ?
